> Talon and PErceptor:
>
> Talon and Perceptor ran towards the pod and started to remove the material
> from Rodimus, hoping that stil he was alive.

Talon and Perceptor are easily able to move towards the pod and open
it, and even pull Rodimus out. However Rodimus himself is covered from
head to toe in thick strands of cable like strands that look like some
sort of techno-cocoon.

A quick scan shows that some of these strands are actually invading
his primary systems as well as power systems and even brain functions.
To attempt to cut them free now, without at least a full medical
facility would kill him.

(TAG)

Preston
